name: shaydz-avmo
description: Virtual Mobile Infrastructure Platform - Revolutionary virtual iOS app environment with containerized virtual machines and full backend integration

scripts.start: echo 'ShaydZ AVMo Platform - Use specific service commands' && echo 'Backend: cd demo-production && docker-compose up -d' && echo 'Demos: cd demos && npm start' && echo 'iOS: Open ShaydZ-AVMo.xcodeproj'
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:backend: cd backend/api-gateway && npm test && cd ../auth-service && npm test && cd ../app-catalog && npm test
scripts.demos:start: cd demos && npm install && npm start
scripts.dev: npm run backend:start && npm run demos:start
scripts.clean: docker system prune -f && rm -rf */node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.setup: npm install && cd backend/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../auth-service && npm install && cd ../app-catalog && npm install && cd ../../demos && npm install && cd ../ios-integration && npm install

author: ShaydZ AVMo Team
